column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The service at Lou Manalti's was incredible! Our waitress was extremely helpful and served us all our slices individually
column2: and would constantly come check up on us. This was my first time trying deep dish pizza
column3: and I guess my expectations were different? The flavor was decent but i guess i wasn't too much of a fan of deep dish. and the thin crust pizza tasted like something i could make myself at home. their lasagna was really good though! i got a spinach based one and it was delicious and very flavorful! also
column4: their garlic bread was okay. it wasn't anything too special
column5: like I said something could be made at home. I see why this place is famous since deep dish pizza is unique so i recommend trying it if you're new to or visiting chicago
